title: Leave Your Request to Me!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Fi-.... Finally.... It’s finally over~~! Thank you, Ayumu-chan! You’re a lifesaver!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’s not that big of a deal, I only helped you with homework~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>No, it really is! You saved me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It just so happens that Nijigaku is ahead in lessons, so. If there’s anything I can help with again, tell me, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Uuu, thank you so much.... I’ll be relying on you! Actually, I don’t want to just say thank you, you can ask me for something too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeeh.... Even if you suddenly ask me that.... Ah, then, I.... want to go see a maid cafe. I think maid outfits are cute, so. Those fluffy aprons.... I want to see one up close. Can I get you to ask Kotori-chan for that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Leave it to me! Then, shall we go? I could use some sweet stuff right now~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’ll tell Kotori-chan that we’re on our way now<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Now!? Right now!? Is it okay for me to have my request granted so soon!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
